posting_body: This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 743 Sq.
Luxury, beauty, and convenience in the city you love, get It all at Greenwood Creek Apartments!
Situated in the Fort Worth suburb of Benbrook, our elegant, gated apartment community is designed for impressive comfort, style, and fun.
Cool off at the swimming pool and play a game of water volleyball Relax on the sundeck or in the spa, or get in a workout at the fitness center.
Spend time with friends and family at our BBQ area.
Almond/White Appliances*, Covered Parking*, Custom Closet*, DR- Backsplash*, Bookshelves*, DR- Black Appliances*, DR-Cabinet Fronts*, DR- L1 Upgrade Kit*, Creek View*, 1st Floor*

Outdoor Kitchens, Sparkling Swimming Pool, Online Maintenance Requests, Limited Access Gate, New Online Services, New Pool Lounge Area, Package Receiving, Clothes Care Center, Cyber Cafe, Hot Tub, Lease Free Dog Park, Creek & Wooded Views, Fitness Studio
